channel.title: New Guy
channel.description:
So I've been playing Rsps's for around 3 years now , but I want to start coding and actually hosting. Would someone suggest a good source and client and guide me through the process. Would really appreciate it :)
Right now my main problem is I dont know what to do after downloading a source and client. I click Run but Error comes up , I'm not sure what I have to change and I have latest version of Jdk and Java.

item.title: New Guy
item.dc:creator: @hammy846 hammy846
item.description:
@hammy846 wrote:

All right guys I browsed around a bit and I think I’m gonna try using this one http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,481264.0.html
Hopefully everything goes well

I already have a problem , It says Error connecting to server , what do I need to change/edit?
Says (Path Cannot be specified )

Read full topic

item.title: New Guy
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

[quote=“marcbob, post:9, topic:452163”][quote author=hammy846 link=topic=555045.msg4064253#msg4064253 date=1343712864]
Thank you so much , and do people still play Delta? Or should I just try jumping onto like a 667

I personally think coding is something you just have to get the hang of , it’s what everyone’s been telling me
[/quote]

Delta is pretty much outdated. You should start with Project Insanity and then explore other servers after you get the hang on PI.

Java obviously becomes easier as you go.[/quote]

Tbh, the first one I’ve seen to support PI.

Read full topic

I click Run but Error comes up , I’m not sure what I have to change and I have latest version of Jdk and Java.[/quote]

:eek:
I’ve seen a lot of people say 317’s are easily understood, but if you just look into the dementhium 639 source, you might just think it’s easy to code.
